parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Structured Text </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a structured text containing the given image. Use [[setAttributes]] to set additional [[Structured_Text#Attributes | attributes]] on the image. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''image''' filename </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> filename: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
 
</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"] == [[parseText]] "Image: <img image='\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa'/>"); // true</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setAttributes]], [[parseText]], [[text]], [[composeText]], [[lineBreak]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 21, 2009
<dt class="note">[[User:Spooner|Spooner]]
<dd class="note">Although there is a dedicated [[image]] command, [[parseText]] gives more options:
<code>_imageText = [[parseText]] "<img size='5' color='#ff0000' image='fish.paa'/>"</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
